column5: He had an ear hematoema ( filled with blood).  Could be a burst blood vessel from shaking.  His ear is normally about a 1/4" thick it filled with blood and swelled to about 1 1/2- 2" thick.         Ian
What a conehead  Poor thing, hope he recovers soon.
Can probably hear what they're whispering in the space station !!
Ouch !!!! What happened to her ear? I'm kind of a dog ear expert. Poor little gal.......Love the flowers
they are paws not flowers mercman and he is a boy .....  man you are gonna give him a complex LOL
Didn't read the title correctly, thought you meant these:
sorry, pink...girls...blue....boys. Give your Vet a kick in the pants
Poor little guy. Hope he's better soon.
I have had Shrimp Poor Boys but never a hot dog Poor Boy sandwich...LOL...  Hope the little guys is better soon and waking you up early for his daily walk.  Bob
Don't know why but this pic reminds me of the old RCA Victor logo. "His master's voice". Get that lil' feller up and healthy again.
Sorry to see the pup injured here's to a fast recovery.   Art
